item.title: Bethany add a quote by Lorrie Moore
item.description: "I had never feared insomnia before--like prison, wouldn't it just give you more time to read?" -- Lorrie Moore

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Lorrie Moore
item.description: "I tried not to think of my one excursion to Whole Foods, over a year ago, where I found myself paralyzed by all the special food for special people, whose special murmurings seemed to be saying, "Out of my way! I want a Tofurkey!" -- Lorrie Moore

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
Bethany add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I declare after all there is no enjoyment like reading! How much sooner one tires of any thing than of a book! -- When I have a house of my own, I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent library." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Bethany add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "True love is the best thing in the world, except for cough drops." -- William Goldman

item.title: Bethany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be." -- J.K. Rowling
